<script type="text/javascript">var GreyhoundLink={postMessage:function(b,a){b=JSON.parse(b);Logger.debug("GreyhoundLink.postMessage handler: "+b.handler,b);switch(b.handler){case"open":window.location.href=b.url;break;case"browser":window.location.href=(/info/.test(b.url))?_HELPDESK:b.url;break;case"display":window.setTimeout(function(){greyhound_events_dispatch("show",{})},0);break;case"close":if(Utils.getIOSVersion()>=8){window.location.href=_CLOSE_URL}else{if(("standalone" in navigator)&&navigator.standalone){window.location.href=_CLOSE_URL}else{window.close()}}break;default:Logger.console("GreyhoundLink: event("+b.handler+") not handled",b)}}};</script>
<script src="https://cdn.getm.pt/javascripts/base_packaged_20170221034617.js?20170221034617-feb20-02-201307111607" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.getm.pt/javascripts/user_portal_packaged_20170221034617.js?20170221034617-feb20-02-201307111607" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script type='text/javascript'>
  //<![CDATA[
    _CAPABILITIES.auto_updates_forecast = false;
    GreyhoundEvents.disableOpen();
    GreyhoundEvents.isInPortal = true;
    UserActions.init(UserActions.PORTAL);
    $(Utils.bind($.mobile.setup, this, true));
  //]]>
</script>
<script type='text/javascript'>
  //<![CDATA[
    
    
    (function(window) {
      var existingOnErrorHandler = window.onerror;
    
      window.onerror = function(message, url, line, column, e) {
        if (!url || url == "undefined") {
          url = document.location.href;
        }
        if (Logger.debugging) {
          alert(message + ", url: " + url + ", line: " + line + " column: " + column);
        }
        if (!Logger.loggedError) {
          Logger.error("JAVASCRIPT ERROR: " + message + ", DEBUG: " + JSON.stringify(window.debugData), { url : url, line : line, column : column }, e);
        }
        Logger.loggedError = false;
        if (existingOnErrorHandler) { // Raven
          return existingOnErrorHandler.apply(this, arguments);
        }
      };
    })(self);
  //]]>
</script>
<script type='text/javascript'>
  //<![CDATA[
    (function() {
       if(! window.setTimeout.apply) { return; }
       var setTimeout = window.setTimeout;
       var logged = false;
       window.setTimeout = function() {
         var callback = arguments[0];
         var wrapperWithTryCatch = function() {
           try {
             if(typeof callback == 'string') {
               eval(callback);
             } else {
               callback.apply(window, arguments);
             }
           } catch(e) {
             if(! logged) {
               logged = true;
               Logger.error("setTimeout " + callback + " failed", {}, e);
             }
             throw(e);
           }
         };
         arguments[0] = wrapperWithTryCatch;
         return setTimeout.apply(window, arguments);
       };
    })();
    
    (function() {
       if(! window.setInterval.apply) { return; }
       var setInterval = window.setInterval;
       var logged = false;
       window.setInterval = function() {
         var callback = arguments[0];
         var wrapperWithTryCatch = function() {
           try {
             if(typeof callback == 'string') {
               eval(callback);
             } else {
               callback.apply(window, arguments);
             }
           } catch(e) {
             if(! logged) {
               logged = true;
               Logger.error("setInterval " + callback + " failed", {}, e);
             }
             throw(e);
           }
         };
         arguments[0] = wrapperWithTryCatch;
         return setInterval.apply(window, arguments);
       };
    })();
  //]]>
</script>

<script type='text/javascript'>
  //<![CDATA[
    $(function() {
      var supportsLocalStorage = function() {
        try { localStorage.setItem("enabled", "1"); return (!!localStorage.length); } catch (e) {}
      };
      if (document.cookie.length === 0 || !supportsLocalStorage()) {
        document.location = "/private_browsing?app_id=b6caa0e184964eeb08a3fc9ba0eb4ce3f6d0cda1";
      }
    });
  //]]>
</script>

<div class="ui-page" data-title="Upgrade Browser" data-update-header="Upgrade Browser" data-user-action-viewed="Upgrade Browser" id="upgrade_browser"><div id='upgrade_browser_app_name'>Patriots Rewards</div>
<div id='upgrade_browser_message'>We're sorry, but mPLUS Rewards requires a more current browser. Please see the list of supported browsers below:</div>
<ul id='upgrade_browser_submessage'>
<li>Chrome 32+</li>
<li>Safari 5+</li>
<li>Firefox 26+</li>
<li>IE 10+</li>
<li>Mobile Safari/Chrome</li>
</ul>
<div class='upgrade_browsers'>
<div class='upgrade_browser'>
<a data-ajax='false' href='https://www.google.com/intl/en_us/chrome/browser/'>
<div class='upgrade_browser_image chrome_browser'></div>
